entry.title: Node.js Project Base Template
entry.content:
There are many Node.js starting template, and after working couple times with Expressjs, I also ended up creating my own base template. You can check it out here.

Base template ideally support your workflow and it has some structure to organize your code. My base template is by no means a full working project like sailsjs, it just a bunch of codes that I would like to be readily available when I started a Node.js project. I will evolve.
